Author: GiediOne

Comment: The timing is pretty good for Democrats though. Three of the four so far are in WI, NH, and MI, which could be potential pickups for the GOP in a good election year. However, we all know that midterms are not typically favorable for the majority party. So Dems have a good shot at not only keeping those three seats, but replacing them with younger incumbents who may be there for decades.  We’ll see how the country is doing in 2026 though. If the tariff war is behind us and the economy is humming again, the GOP’s chances in 2026 would be improved significantly. November 2026 is light years away in terms of politics.
